name: SEVADHARAM PATIENT CARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: The organization was registered under Society Registration Act 1960, on 9th Sept.2010. ISO 9001:2008 Certificate was also obtained on 6th June 2010. The society provides Nurses & Attendants for patients very successfully and efficiently. Apart from this, Health care Equipment, Ambulance, and Mobile Mortuary services are also provided to the patients. Our aim is to render selfless services to the patients for granting them utmost relief from their ailments.Services Available :AttendantsNursesNursing ServicesHealthcare AccessoriesAmbulanceMobile Mortuary
